definition: marked by peace and prosperity, a mythical bird said to breed at the time of the winter solstice in a nest floating on the sea and to have the power of calming the winds and waves
details:
adjective
- marked by peace and prosperity
= synonyms: golden
- idyllically calm and peaceful
noun
- a mythical bird said to breed at the time of the winter solstice in a nest floating on the sea and to have the power of calming the winds and waves
